mapper.insert: insert into cskaoyan_mall_mallconfig ( litemall_mall_address, litemall_mall_name, litemall_mall_phone, litemall_mall_qq) values ( #{cskaoyan_mall_mall_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_mall_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_mall_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_mall_qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cskaoyan_mall_expressconfig ( litemall_express_freight_min, litemall_express_freight_value) values ( #{cskaoyan_mall_express_freight_min,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_express_freight_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cskaoyan_mall_orderconfig ( litemall_order_comment, litemall_order_unconfirm, litemall_order_unpaid) values ( #{cskaoyan_mall_order_comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_order_unconfirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_order_unpaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cskaoyan_mall_wxconfig ( litemall_wx_catlog_goods, litemall_wx_catlog_list, litemall_wx_index_brand, litemall_wx_index_hot, litemall_wx_index_new, litemall_wx_index_topic, litemall_wx_share) values ( #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_catlog_goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_catlog_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_index_brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_index_hot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_index_new,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_index_topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cskaoyan_mall_wx_share,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
